com.tbg.core.model

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tbg.core.model.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPosition, java.io.Serializable

    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IPosition
    This describes a position.
    If the quantity is negative, means a SHORT position.

    History:
    - [27.04.2006] Created (sfl)
    - [11.09.2012]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPriceDifference

        public double getPriceDifference(double price)
        returns the difference between handed over price and open price of this position. Takes into consideration the direction of this position. This does not take into consideration the amount!
        Specified by:
